hibernate-mapping.query: select a.marca.id as id, a.marca.codigo as codigo, a.marca.nombre as nombre, a.marca.descripcion as descripcion, sum(a.stock) as stock from Articulo a group by a.marca.id, a.marca.codigo, a.marca.nombre, a.marca.descripcion order by stock desc

select a.rubro.id as id, a.rubro.codigo as codigo, a.rubro.nombre as nombre, a.rubro.descripcion as descripcion, sum(a.stock) as stock from Articulo a group by a.rubro.id, a.rubro.codigo, a.rubro.nombre, a.rubro.descripcion order by stock desc
